name: Cecile Monina
text: Unprecedented access to information means more opportunities for confirmation bias, and algorithms help foster it, e.g.  https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2016/nov/16/facebook-bias-bubble-us-election-conservative-liberal-news-feed
